name: Eternal Home
description:
Eternal Home is a Third-Person Exploration/Quest game developed to teach sound Christian doctrines in a fun way. It allows the player to explore hand-crafted virtual landscape and complete Bible based quests.

Features:

  • Fully based on Scriptures.
  • Supports LAN Multiplayer.
  • No DRM (Digital rights management).
  • No internet connection required.
  • Game is portable without installation.

Prerequisites:

  • Operating System: Windows 7 64-bit or above.
  • Processor: Intel i3 or faster.
  • Minimum Resolution: 1024×768
  • Graphics Memory: Minimum 2 GB Graphics Card
  • DirectX Runtime: DirectX End-User Runtimes (June 2010)
